sidebarHeader.errorMessage: Not allowed to open sidebar in mobile device

categories.heading: Categories
categories.description: On this page you can find all stream categories

streams.heading: Streams
streams.description: All the streams at the website

follow.confirmUnfollowMessage: You will no longer receive notifications from this channel and it will be removed from your following list

chat.heading: Chat
chat.unavailableMessage: Chat is unavailable while the channel is offline. Please check back later!

register.heading: Sign up for Nexa
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Log in
register.successAlertDescription: A confirmation email has been sent to your address. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder.
register.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating your account

resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The email you entered during registration
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have Telegram notifications enabled, the link has also been sent there

newPassword.heading: New Password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Log in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you entered during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password to confirm
newPassword.errorMessage: Error while setting the new password

deactivate.heading: Account Deactivation
deactivate.pinDescription: A code has been sent to your email. If you enabled Telegram notifications, we have sent the code there as well
deactivate.emailDescription: The email address you entered during registration
deactivate.passwordDescription: The password you entered during registration
deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your settings

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Set up your profile, update your avatar, change your bio, and add links to social networks to make your page more attractive to other users.

avatar.heading: Profile Image

confirmModal.heading: Remove avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to remove your profile image? This action cannot be undone

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP or GIF. Max size: 10 MB

createForm.heading: Social Media Links
createForm.urlDescription: Where does this link lead? Enter the full URL, for example https://github.com/nikita-morkovkin

socialLinks.errorReorderMessage: Error changing social media links order

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including access changes, security, and deactivation options.

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Increase your account security by activating TOTP authentication. This additional layer of protection requires a unique code, making your account less vulnerable to unauthorized access.

enable.heading: Enabling TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP
enable.pinDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code provided by your authentication app.

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?

deactivation.heading: Account Deactivation
deactivation.description: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to log in. The account will be permanently deleted after 7 days. Until then, you can contact support to regain access and unlock your account.

confirmModal.heading: Confirm Deactivation
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? Access can only be restored within 7 days.

header.heading: Appearance
header.description: Customize the look and feel of the site interface to your liking. Choose a theme and language to make your experience more comfortable.

theme.heading: Change Theme
theme.description: You can choose a dark or light theme for the site interface

language.heading: Site Language
language.description: Select the language that will be used on the site

color.heading: Accent color
color.description: Choose the color for website interface

header.heading: Notifications
header.description: Configure how you want to receive notifications from Nexa. You will be notified about the start of broadcasts on channels you follow, as well as new subscribers.

siteNotifications.heading: On-site Notifications
siteNotifications.description: If you disable on-site notifications, you will not receive alerts about new subscribers to your channel or notifications about new broadcasts.

telegramNotifications.heading: Telegram Notifications
telegramNotifications.description: If you enable Telegram notifications, your Nexa account will be linked to your Telegram account. You will receive messages about new subscriptions, new streams, password resets, and two-factor authentication codes.

notifications.errorMessage: An error occurred while saving your settings. Please try again later.

header.heading: Sessions
header.description: Sessions are the devices you are currently using or have used to log into your TeaStream account. Active sessions are shown here.

confirmModal.heading: Delete session
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action will permanently remove the session on this device and terminate all active activities associated with it.

header.heading: Stream Keys
header.description: Generate a URL and key to start your broadcast

instructionModal.heading: OBS Setup Guide for Live Streaming
instructionModal.description: To start sharing your content with your audience, follow this detailed guide on connecting OBS Studio. Just a few steps and you'll be ready to go live!
instructionModal.step1Title: üîë Step 1: Download OBS Studio and Generate Server URL & Stream Key
instructionModal.step1Description: To start broadcasting, you need to obtain two essential elements: Server URL and Stream Key. Follow these steps:
instructionModal.downloadObsDescription: Before setting up your stream, download and install the software
instructionModal.copyKeys: Copy Server URL and Stream Key
instructionModal.copyKeysDescription: Once generated, two fields will appear: Server URL and Stream Key. Click the copy icons next to each field to save the data to your clipboard.
instructionModal.step2Description: Now that you have the necessary data, let's configure OBS for your broadcast:
instructionModal.openObsDescription: If you haven't installed OBS yet, download it from the official website and install it. Once launched, the OBS main window will open.
instructionModal.openStreamSettingsDescription: In the top menu, click "File" ‚Üí "Settings". Go to the "Stream" tab.
instructionModal.enterDetailsDescription: In the "Service" field, select "Custom...". Paste your previously copied Server URL into the "URL" field. Paste your Stream Key into the "Stream Key" field.
instructionModal.saveSettingsDescription: Click "Apply" and then "OK" to save your changes.
instructionModal.step3Description: Once OBS is successfully configured, you are ready to start your live stream:
instructionModal.startStreamDescription: Go back to the OBS main screen and click the "Start Streaming" button.
instructionModal.monitorStreamDescription: Your broadcast will start in real-time, and you will be able to monitor it both on the platform and in OBS.
instructionModal.congrats: ‚ú® Congratulations! You have successfully set up OBS for streaming on our platform. Your audience is waiting for new exciting moments and content! üéâ

createModal.heading: Generate Keys
createModal.ingressTypeDescription: Select RTMP for classic broadcasting or WHIP for WebRTC connections.

header.heading: Chat Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your chat settings.

isChatEnabled.heading: Enable Chat
isChatEnabled.description: If you enable chat, viewers will be able to send messages during your broadcast.

isChatFollowersOnly.heading: Followers-only Chat
isChatFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only your followers will be able to send messages in chat.

isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.heading: Premium Followers-only Chat
isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only premium subscribers will be able to send messages in chat.

header.heading: Premium Plans
header.description: Here is a list of premium plans for your channel.

alert.heading: Channel Verification Required
alert.description: To create premium plans, your channel must be verified. You only need 10 subscribers to get a verified badge and unlock access to this feature.

createForm.heading: Create Plan
createForm.titleDescription: Enter a name for your plan. This name will be displayed to your subscribers.
createForm.descriptionDescription: Describe what your plan includes. This will help your subscribers understand the benefits of the subscription.
createForm.priceDescription: Specify the price of your plan in the currency. This is the amount users will pay for the subscription.

header.heading: Transactions
header.description: Transactions related to channel memberships are displayed here.

emptyState.heading: Nothing found
emptyState.text: We've searched every corner of our site, but unfortunately, nothing matched your request. Maybe try something else?
